name: part_010
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz and Ouro Kronii perform a high-energy song with dynamic dance moves.
Transition sequence featuring members' symbols and a futuristic cityscape.
IRyS and Ouro Kronii perform the song 'HALF' on the main stage.

subtitles.original: ...も合わないわ
subtitles.english: ...doesn't match either.

subtitles.original: いっそのこと切り離した方が楽なのみんな
subtitles.english: It's easier for everyone to just cut it off.

subtitles.original: 大体あなたのこと私ダイダイダイダイ大嫌い
subtitles.english: Basically, I hate, hate, hate, hate you so much.

subtitles.original: お前が情けないもはやバイバイバイバイバイしたい
subtitles.english: You're pathetic, I want to say bye, bye, bye, bye, bye now.

subtitles.original: 脳内もよそ見も言われカイカイカイカイ会話な
subtitles.english: My mind, looking away, being told things, the conversation is itch-itch-itch-itch-itchy.

subtitles.original: どうだって私のことあなたダイダイダイダイ大嫌い
subtitles.english: No matter what, you hate, hate, hate, hate me so much.

subtitles.original: 愛想尽き果て一に無し七に蜂の巣ぶち込めば
subtitles.english: Running out of patience, no one for one, seven for the honeycomb to be stuffed in.

subtitles.original: 鳴らねばならぬでもニコチンは死
subtitles.english: It must ring, but nicotine is death.

subtitles.original: 愛に満ちて自画付いて結末はボミスボミス
subtitles.english: Filled with love, self-satisfied, the end is a blunder, a blunder.

subtitles.original: 天気雨教師後味一生嫌でいたくないわ
subtitles.english: Sunshower, teacher, aftertaste, I don't want to be hated for a lifetime.

subtitles.original: I'm not interested in matching.
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in matching.

subtitles.original: I'm gonna express myself in this song.
subtitles.english: I'm gonna express myself in this song.

subtitles.original: H A L F
subtitles.english: H A L F

subtitles.original: 簡単な英語しか分かんない
subtitles.english: I only understand simple English.

subtitles.original: 踊るの大好き
subtitles.english: I love to dance.

subtitles.original: 健康第一
subtitles.english: Health first.

subtitles.original: 憧れとコンプレックス大渋滞
subtitles.english: A big traffic jam of admiration and complexes.

subtitles.original: カーストでノリノリ
subtitles.english: Riding high on the caste.

subtitles.original: カーストは飽き飽き
subtitles.english: Sick and tired of the caste.

subtitles.original: がむしゃらでいたい いつもいつでも
subtitles.english: I want to be reckless, always and forever.

subtitles.original: 恵まれてるかどうかを
subtitles.english: Whether I'm blessed or not...

subtitles.original: 楽しんでいたい 泣きたくないから
subtitles.english: I want to have fun, because I don't want to cry.

subtitles.original: 問い質す神様がいなくても
subtitles.english: Even if there's no God to question.

subtitles.original: もう格好つけていくしかないじゃん
subtitles.english: Now there's nothing left but to act cool, right?

subtitles.original: そのままこのまま降り注ぐ光ね
subtitles.english: Just as it is, just like this, the light pours down.

subtitles.original: 半分なんて思ったことないぜ
subtitles.english: I've never thought of myself as just a half.

subtitles.original: このままそのまま突き進む光
subtitles.english: Like this, just like that, the light pushes forward.

subtitles.original: ビジュアルなんかじゃ止まんない
subtitles.english: Can't be stopped by just visuals.

subtitles.original: 笑わせたいのに
subtitles.english: I want to make you laugh, but...

subtitles.original: 上手に出来ない
subtitles.english: I can't do it well.

subtitles.original: 誰かのせいにはしたくないよ
subtitles.english: I don't want to blame anyone.

subtitles.original: 生まれてみたいから
subtitles.english: Because I wanted to be born...

subtitles.original: 生まれてきただけ
subtitles.english: I was just born.

subtitles.original: 新しい服と幸せ
subtitles.english: New clothes and happiness.

subtitles.original: そんなに僕は無いでしょう
subtitles.english: I don't have that much of them, do I?

subtitles.original: それでも今も誰かが打ち放つ
subtitles.english: Yet even now, someone unleashes...

subtitles.original: 悲しみと怒りの
subtitles.english: ...sadness and anger.

subtitles.original: H A L F
subtitles.english: H A L F

subtitles.original: 損をしたり
subtitles.english: Losing out,

subtitles.original: ちょっと辛い
subtitles.english: feeling a bit down...

subtitles.original: そんな日もあるけど
subtitles.english: There are days like that.

subtitles.original: 茨の道で花が咲くなら
subtitles.english: If a flower blooms on a path of thorns,

subtitles.original: 絶対見逃せない
subtitles.english: I definitely can't miss it.

subtitles.original: もう格好つけていくしかないじゃん
subtitles.english: Now there's nothing left but to act cool, right?

subtitles.original: そのままこのまま降り注ぐ光ね
subtitles.english: Just as it is, just like this, the light pours down.

subtitles.original: 半分なんて思ったことないぜ
subtitles.english: I've never thought of myself as just a half.

subtitles.original: このままそのまま突き進む光
subtitles.english: Like this, just like that, the light pushes forward.
